title: All specified properties are returned when an IMAGE was created
gherkin:
When the user creates an "IMAGE"
Then the response should contain the following keys
  | key                |
  | external_id        |
  | image_provider     |
  | name               |
  | description        |
  | creator            |
  | license            |
  | tags               |
  | source             |
  | image_url_original |
  | image_url_xxl      |
  | image_url_xl       |
  | image_url_l        |
  | image_url_m        |
  | image_url_s        |
  | image_url_xs       |
